Description: Robot bagger that can efficiently bag grocery items
Made out of very strong material
Grocery bag with adjustable temperature control to keep food at certain temp
Smaller and easy to maneuver shopping cart
show where employees are and allow you to talk to them directly
Display wait time at each register on screen
Water bottle that connects to app to track progress
Water boiler that automatically refills from tap
Screen attached to cart that tracks the prices of items put into cart
Shows location of store items
People can scan the title of packed food to know how much energy in it, and help them to calculate the calorie.
Can analyze the contain of a meal, and calculate the calorie.
people can see how much fat they have burnt through exercie.
People can get help through the device when they doing exercise.
For people who make up their mind to improve their health condition but are weak in self control. Force them to get fit(exercise or diet) .
This function is connected to taser reminder. It can let people stop the force program.
Help people drink enough water during a day.
Scan the heart rate, to help people over-exercised.
Give suggestions base on the data collected from peoples' daily lives, to help them keep fit.
The product should have not only the powerful functions, but also the fashionable appearance.
A device that guards sweets and junk food and does not allow user to access it unless they have been keeping up with their nutrition goals. Would link to a phone app.
app that keep inventory of the user's food and suggests meals based on time and inventory.
Robot that keeps inventory of food in the freezer and defrosts food accordingly
wearable that scans food and estimates nutritional value by comparing to food in database
Item would record your actions throughout the day and automatically logs your food intake and calculated nutrition for you.
Robot that prepares food for user to cook. (i.e. cuts vegetables and measures ingredients)
User inputs the dishes they want to cook and the robot shops for necessary ingredients and delivers them to user
robot that makes sandwiches for users that don't have time to cook.
Robot that checks food in fridge (i.e. vegetables, left overs, dairy, etc) and determines whether to keep or throw out

Device that makes a warm beverage for you based on the time of day and how much you got. For example if its late at night, the device would make you a soothing tea, if its first thing in the morning after a rough night, it may make you a double shot latte. learns user's likes and dislikes
A screen on shopping cart that can connect with app and help the efficiency of picking up what to buy
A shopping cart where we can place and plug our phones
A sensor that can put in mouth and monitor our vitamin and calcium intake
A watch that can detect our disease and symptom by monitoring our physiology
An app that connect with GPS and can record what we eat  and give us healthier suggestion based on what we have eaten
An app that teach people how to cook and buy food ingredients in the nearest stores efficiently
An app that compares price and quality of different restaurants and gives users profitable recommendation
Wearable blood sugar monitor for diabetic people
An alarm clock that can monitor sleep quality and wake up users when they are not in deep sleep
A cabinet that can record expiration date of every food and record users to eat them before the food spoils
Cap that measures body temp and acts as a cooling/heat pad
Robot that helps you retrieve items from high places
Voice activation is implemented
A shopping cart in the form of a bot that follows you around in store and holds your items
A cutting board that detects spoiled food that is placed on top of it
Give suggestions on what type of food to choose in order to keep fit, and how to cook them.
Can scan the water quality (what's the composition of the water), temperature, etc.).
A cutting board that can weigh the substance on it.
A bed which will be rough in the morning that can wake up people.
An app that can help women to record their period and remind them two days before next period comes so they can stock up on supplies
electric grocery cart that activates when the cart gets too heavy
Cart that unloads groceries into the car for user.
Scans items put into refrigerator and keeps track of how much is left. Example, alerts user if pickles are low
Monitors user's hydration level and beeps or vibrates to let user know to drink
Wearable patch that connects to an app to notify user which aspects of their diet are lacking
A watch that can remind users to go to sleep when they are over fatigue to decrease the rate of sudden death
A electric sticker that can stick on skin to make hot compress easier and prevent scald
A robot that can find our acupoint and give us more comfortable massage
A necklace that can monitor and record our body fat and muscle content
An app that we can create our shopping list and record the price. It can also connect with the monitor on shopping cart that can remind us when we pass by the items we need in grocery stores.
